author: admin
title: Escort Announces Major News Webcast
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/28/2015 @ 5:45 AM   ESCORT Inc. 
PHOENIX, Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- The category leader and innovator of the majority of detection protection patents, Escort Inc. (EscortRadar.com) , today announced that they will be party to a major news webcast scheduled for live webcast tomorrow, Sep 29(th) Noon ET (9 AM PT). 
Escort is the category leader and designer of the multi-awarded SEMA Show "best new product" winner (2013), the original PASSPORT Max(TM) High Definition DSP radar detector and the SEMA 'best new product' (2011) winner with the Escort Live(TM) ticket protection app that helps drivers by providing unprecedented social networked and shared ticket protection and road information to drive smarter. 
For more information on the Escort PASSPORT Max(TM) Radar Detector and the Escort Live(TM) ticket protection app, visit EscortRadar.com or, call the company direct at 866.709.8744. 
About Escort Inc. Escort is the leading manufacturer of high-performance radar and laser detectors and the patented Escort Live(TM) real-time ticket protection network. Escort manufactures products under the Escort, PASSPORT, Max, REDLINE, SOLO, Pro and BELTRONICS brands. The company is headquartered in West Chester, Ohio, with its principal manufacturing facility located in Mississauga, Ontario, Canada. Additional information about Escort, Inc. is available at EscortRadar.com.
